children.text: The reinforcing steel has been properly installed with adequate clearance to the boxing that is to form the side of the of the finished slab.
It is a requirement of section 5.3.2 Reinforcement of AS 2870 Residential Slabs and Footings, that
‘Reinforcement in rafts and slabs shall be placed with minimum concrete cover of 40mm to unprotected ground and 40mm to external exposure’.

All of the perimeter steel reinforcement has been checked, and has adequate clearance to the edges. Any areas where deficiencies were identified have been addressed, with the area ready for concrete to be poured.
